review_blob: When visiting my friend in Nevada, he always drank this beer and I hated it, but after a while it grew on me and now Im hooked. Its a flavor you definitely have to get used to, but once you do youll be hooked too. Its a spicy beer with a distinct taste. the chili is a hybrid of a jalapeno and a milder chili pepper. You need to drink a 12 pack before you get hooked.... Cheers!!
